author: John

review: I bought 2 of these and 1 Apple TV (we have prime and netflix). Our family prefers the TVs with the Amazon Fire! Amazon Fire lets you download tons more apps, which means an endless amount of content. The Apple TV may have the same apps (like History Channel, A&E;, etc.), but their content contracts do not allow as much "unlocked" content and you get more clips instead of full episodes. There is a HUGE difference in the amount and the quality of content between the Fire and Apple TV. I have an iPhone, so I can get content on my iPhone and then use the AirPlay to have the content displayed on our TV, but that means instead of being able to use my iPhone for a phone, my iPhone has to be used as a content provider just so we can view full episodes of content on the TV. It's not perfect and I hate the idea of not being able to see current content on my TV without having to use my iPhone, it's stupid, but it does work. Amazon Fire is just better. With Amazon Fire you get so many more apps, including all the apps that Apple TV has (less than 100), PLUS the 100's that Amazon Fire can download. It's just better.
author: Laverne "casa con mi jitos"

review: I purchased the Amazon Fire in December as in winter I spend way too much time indoors. I really like it.The best thing is the price (I also got it with a rebate) and I have the Amazon Prime membership (About $80.00) for the whole year so right there it is a really good price. Besides I'm subscribed to Netflix, PBS and other TV channels and see them using Amazon Fire.Also it is very easy to connect and use.Having the remote control helps a lot (C'mon we get a bit lazy in winter) however I thing the whole remote control could be improved. The feature of voice recognition is very useful to search in Amazon, but it doesn't work with the other apps. Also when English is not your first language and if you have an accent it is a bit frustrating. Also the typing the name running though all the letters could be improved. Maybe using the old fashion texting way  (1 is abc, 2 is def, etc) will be an improvement.In general I think it is a really good product
author: C. Vivas "Cleo"
